sentences.sContent: An example of negative eugenics would be the attempt to eradicate a harmful recessive gene.
sentences.sContent_eng: An example of negative eugenics would be the attempt to eradicate a harmful recessive gene.
sentences.sCn: 消极优生学的范例是试图破坏一种对人体有害的隐性基因。

sentences.sContent: Most plants carry a large genetic load for deleterious recessive genes of which a few are homozygous and depress growth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Most plants carry a large genetic load for deleterious recessive genes of which a few are homozygous and depress growth.
sentences.sCn: 多数植物带有大量有害的隐性基因的“遗传负荷”，其中少数是纯合的，因而降低了生长。

words.tran: （礼拜仪式后牧师及唱诗班退场时所唱的）退场赞美诗

trans.tranCn: 隐性遗传的； 后退的
trans.tranOther: a recessive  gene  is passed to children from their parents only if both parents have the gene
